name: Do Not Push the Button!
description:
Not much is known of "The Creator". His real name is a complete mystery . . . Some people rumor that he's just a cranky and short scientist with weird spiky hair. Others have even heard him talk about his "evil plan" to rule the whole world with his unique Toys, Games, and Collectibles ™ . . . yet no one believes him.

Even so, The Creator is an electricity maniac. He's always creating stuff in his Secret Underground Lab, no matter what. His most recent experiment is a prototype he calls "Beep". These "Beeps" are living video game consoles that are incredibly energetic for their small portable size. 

 As a player, you get to visit The Creator's Lab as a volunteer tester, so now you can play with Beep if you want. But beware: DO NOT PRESS ANY BUTTON. It could interfere with The Creator's testing process and he kinda goes nuts if people push his buttons (no pun intended). So please, never...I repeat....NEVER push ANY BUTTON, specially if it is blue and has an X on it, alright? DON'T PUSH IT !!! D:<<<<<<<

☆ How to Play:☆
1. Tap (or Click) to start the game.
2. Tap on the Blue Button to push it. Push it as much as you can (if you dare...) (⊙_⊙) 3. HAVE FUN, OK ?! ヾ( ･`⌓´･)ﾉﾞ

✧ This is a fully Interactive Microgame best experienced on desktop platforms. The "X" keyboard key also pushes the Button.
✧ Concept, Game Development, Art, Animation and Sound & Voice Acting by @Joclpacheb.
✧ Playful Chunks © Characters, Games, Stories and Concepts are all creative works of @Joclpacheb ✧ Follow the project at @PlayfulChunks on Twitter.
